title: Undergrad
description: For fans of Pretty Little Liars and the movie Heathers comes UNDERGRAD, a naughty New Adult full length prequel to The Manhattanites series. "They can have anything their hearts desire...except for the way it used to be."Taddy posed nude to pay for her Ivy League education. Lex kept a family secret in order to escape her past. Vive signed away her parental rights to become an adult. Blake, he settled for the wrong guy. Four very different friends. One bright future ahead. And the dark nightmare that binds them all…Lex befriended him.Blake loved him.Vive killed him.Taddy buried him...or did she?Each has their reasons for attending Columbia University—but the hopes they carry with them do little to prepare them for their new life as adults on the Upper West Side. Can this clique escape the sins of their past? Or will the haunting of their most unthinkable act rise up to engulf them for revenge?(Content Warning: Four spoiled rich kids graduating from a prestigious boarding school deal with drug addiction, homosexuality, underage drinking, teen pregnancy, bullying and murder.) Note: this is the complete collection of all four novels in The Undergrad Years series combined in one volume.
author: Avery Aster
